snippet.title: Refreshing Chemical Warfare - Captain Soda: Short Gameplay Preview
snippet.description:
Wishlist on steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1862950/Captain_Soda/ 
Sign up to the mailing list! https://www.colebeernaerts.com/captainsoda

Engage in refreshing chemical warfare wielding weaponized soft drinks to defend Earth from waves of invading aliens! Captain Soda is a charming soda-themed action arena shooter inspired by Super Crate Box.
